definition: Shigatse or Xigaze, Tibetan: Gzhis ka rtse, city and prefecture in central Tibet
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan
sun/day/date, day of the month
(onom.) sound of coughing or vomiting

Shigatse or Xigaze prefecture in central Tibet, Tibetan: Gzhis ka rtse sa khul, Chinese Rikaze
Shigatse or Xigaze, Tibetan: Gzhis ka rtse, city and prefecture in central Tibet, Chinese Rikaze

sentences.chinese: 順雅魯藏布江逆流而上，是日喀則。

sentences.english: After this nice intermezzo we drive in one go all the way to Shigatze.
sentences.chinese: 在這美妙的小插曲之後，我們徑直開往日喀則。

sentences.english: A woman in Shigatse said she begged to support her six children.
sentences.chinese: 一位日喀則的婦女說她乞討是爲了養活她的六個孩子。

sentences.english: The anti-aphid of the rapes from Xigaze region was significantly higher than those of Shannan region and other regions.
sentences.chinese: 日喀則地區的油菜抗蚜性明顯高於山南和其它地區。
